Commentary: Aamer Yamin to Simmons, 1 run, back of a length close to off stump, punched into the covers
Aamer Yamin to Nauman Anwar, no run, nips back in from off and taps back to the bowler
Aamer Yamin to Nauman Anwar, no run, length ball on off stump, lovely channel. Blocked!
Aamer Yamin to Nauman Anwar, no run, tad wide on off pole, kept a shade low too. Nauman gives everything but fails to put bat on to the ball
Aamer Yamin to Nauman Anwar, no run, on off corridor, pitched and swung away to fox his defence.
Aamer Yamin to Nauman Anwar, no run, brilliant! Length ball on off stump, no room whatsoever and dabbed back to the bowler
Tait to Simmons, 1 run, short, angling into the ribcage, tucked away into the square leg region
Tait to Nauman Anwar, FOUR, looks for the yorker and the length isn't quite full enough. Nauman simply flicks it away, up and over midwicket
Tait to Nauman Anwar, 1 run, short, angling into the body, pulled through backward square leg
Tait to Simmons, no run, back of a length outside off, Simmons looks to make room and carve it away but can't put bat to ball. His weight was moving away from the ball as he played the shot
Tait to Simmons, 1 run, fullish outside off, opened his bat face to steer it to the right of third man
Tait to Nauman Anwar, 1 run, back of a length on middle and leg, defended into the midwicket region
Aamer Yamin to Nauman Anwar, FOUR, shot! It's overpitched and wide of off, was there to be hit, but he did it very well, frees his arms for the sliced drive to the right of cover point
Aamer Yamin to Nauman Anwar, 1 run, short, angling down leg. Can't connect with the pull, ends up inside-edging it to the left of the keeper
Aamer Yamin to Simmons, no run, length ball wide of off, slapped to backward point
Aamer Yamin to Simmons, FOUR, fullish, and again he gives up too much width. Simmons frees his arms and slams it to the right of short cover
Aamer Yamin to Simmons, no run, slower ball outside off, clouts it hard to the left of midwicket, where Sammy makes a good diving stop
Aamer Yamin to Simmons, 1 run, full on middle and off, clipped to long-on
Tait to Simmons, no run, fuller now, but again the line is all wrong, slings this down the leg side, maybe clips the pad on its way through to the keeper after he misses the flick
Tait to Simmons, no run, very full on middle stump, makes a bit of room and plays a firm drive down to mid-off
Tait to Simmons, 1 run, full-toss angling into the body. Looks to club it away and it rolls softly into the leg side off the inner half of his bat
Tait to Nauman Anwar, no run, shortish on off stump, whipped to midwicket
Tait to Nauman Anwar, FOUR, on the pads, and that's asking for punishment with fine leg in the circle. Just flicks it away to the left of the fielder and it simply races away
Tait to Nauman Anwar, no run, slower ball outside off, saw Nouman making himself room. Had to wait on it and didn't get any pace to work with, just poked it to the fielder at point

Wahab Riaz to Simmons, OUT, And he strikes first ball! Simmons looks to make room to hit through the off side, and he doesn't get any width, it's fuller than he would like, and the ball is through him quicker than expected, before he can bring his bat down fully
Wahab Riaz to Vince, no run, length ball on off stump, gets forward for a checked push to wide mid-off
Wahab Riaz to Vince, 1 run, length ball on middle stump, pushed gently towards wide mid-off
Wahab Riaz to Nauman Anwar, no run, back of a length outside off, opens his bat face to steer to backward point
Wahab Riaz to Nauman Anwar, no run, slower ball outside off, Nauman slogs across the line, can't put bat to ball
Wahab Riaz to Nauman Anwar, no run, slower ball on off stump, gets forward and clips it into the leg side and the bowler moves quickly in his follow-through to cut it off

Mohammad Asghar to Vince, OUT, flat, angling into off stump, lets it come on and dabs towards short third man. They take on the fielder, and it's not the greatest decision as Shahid Yousuf fires in a direct hit that finds Nouman short of the crease at the keeper's end, even though he dives to get home
Mohammad Asghar to Imad Wasim, no run, sharp turn into him as he looks to make room, ends up blocking to short cover

Mohammad Asghar to Imad Wasim, OUT, down the track now, heaves across the line and miscues to midwicket. And what's happened here? There's another appeal for a run-out. It's gone to the third umpire. Terrible running from Imad. I can't really call it running, because he was simply walking the run, and the fielder saw this and fired in a throw at the non-striker's end. Imad doesn't ground his bat, simply looks to step into the crease, and he's out by a fair distance
Mohammad Asghar to Vince, no run, full on middle and off, blocked back to the bowler
Mohammad Asghar to Vince, FOUR, shortish outside off, and that's a fantastic shot, makes a bit of room and uses the pace to steer the ball through point. There's no one back at sweeper cover
Mohammad Asghar to Vince, 1 run, flat, angling into the pads, clipped to the left of short fine leg
Shahid Afridi to Vince, 1 run, fullish outside off, and Vince looks to drive through cover. Ends up inside-edging into the short fine leg region
Shahid Afridi to Shoaib Malik, no run, tossed up on a good length outside off, stretches out to push to cover

Shahid Afridi to Shoaib Malik, SIX, sees him coming down the track and looks to bowl it wider and out of Malik's reach, but it's not wide enough for that. Ends up giving him plenty of swinging room and he launches it cleanly over long-off
Shahid Afridi to Shoaib Malik, no run, quicker and closer to off stump, pushed back to the bowler
Shahid Afridi to Shoaib Malik, no run, a bit more air and he stretches out to punch to short cover
Shahid Afridi to Shoaib Malik, no run, short outside off, hurries through to beat the attempted cut
Mohammad Asghar to Vince, no run, down the track, gets too close to the pitch for a big shot, jabs it back to the bowler
Mohammad Asghar to Vince, 2 runs, back of a length, angling into middle stump, makes himself room and slaps it to the left of sweeper cover
Mohammad Asghar to Vince, 1 run, quickish length ball angling into off stump, stays back for the gentle push towards long-off
Mohammad Asghar to Shoaib Malik, 2 runs, back of a length outside off, goes back and across and works it away through square leg

Mohammad Asghar to Shoaib Malik, OUT, down the track and he fires it full and flat at his feet. Malik goes through with his shot, is too close to the pitch to get the desired elevation, and scoops a simple catch to long-on
Mohammad Asghar to Vince, no run, back of a length, no turn, slides on towards middle stump and offers Vince no room. Blocks it back to the bowler
Shahid Afridi to Shakib Al Hasan, no run, quickish length ball on off stump, blocked back down the pitch
Shahid Afridi to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run, full, driven to long-on
Wicket: ['Shoaib Malik c Sammy b Mohammad Asghar 8 (7b 0x4 1x6) SR: 114.28']

Commentary: Shahid Afridi to Vince, 1 run, tossed up outside off, too full for the full-blooded sweep and he hits it all along the ground out to deep midwicket
Shahid Afridi to Shakib Al Hasan, no run, quickish, angling across Shakib, who lets it come on to dab to short third man

Shahid Afridi to Shakib Al Hasan, OUT, and he's gone! Again it slants across Shakib, and gets big on Shakib as he looks to whip across the line. May have been a googly too, and he ends up slicing it in the air off the outside edge and short third man takes an excellent low catch diving forward
Shahid Afridi to Bopara, 1 run, fullish outside off, pushed into the cover point region
Mohammad Asghar to Bopara, 1 run, down the track, whips the full ball firmly down the ground, down to long-on

Mohammad Asghar to Vince, SIX, down the track, doesn't reach the pitch of this one, tossed up a little slower, and hits across it. Ends up slicing it high in the air, but manages to clear long-off, where Hafeez dived over the rope to try and catch it. I think he was so fixed on the ball that he didn't realise he was going to collide into the advertising hoardings
Mohammad Asghar to Vince, 2 runs, back of a length outside off, punched into the covers
Wicket: ['Shakib Al Hasan c Mohammad Asghar b Shahid Afridi 1 (4b 0x4 0x6) SR: 25.00']

Commentary: Mohammad Asghar to Vince, 1 run, full on the pads, flicked through square leg
Mohammad Asghar to Bopara, 1 run, down the track, drives to sweeper cover
Mohammad Asghar to Vince, 1 run, full on leg stump, clipped away through square leg
Shahid Afridi to Vince, 1 run, Looks to whip a back-of-a-length ball through the leg side. It stops on him and pops up off the leading edge, bounces down in front of long-on
Shahid Afridi to Bopara, 3 runs, fullish and wide of off, reaches out to slap it to the left of sweeper cover. Throw to the keeper's end isn't accurate and they take an overthrow
Shahid Afridi to Vince, 1 run, makes a bit of room, drives the flighted middle-stump ball inside-out t othe left of long-off
Shahid Afridi to Bopara, no run, quickish length ball angling into middle and leg, defended off the back foot into the covers
Shahid Afridi to Bopara, 1 run, flighted ball wide of off, driven to sweeper cover
Shahid Afridi to Vince, FOUR, full and wide again, and this time Vince bisects sweeper cover and long-off with a gorgeous drive, lovely use of the hands to manouevre that into the gap
Aamer Yamin to Bopara, no run, slower ball wide of off stump, reaches out to drive and chops it along the ground to the keeper, off the inside edge
Aamer Yamin to Bopara, 1 run, down the track and he digs it in shorter, outside off. Hops in the air to flat-bat to long-off
Aamer Yamin to Vince, 1 run, full on middle and leg, clipped away towards long-on
Aamer Yamin to Bopara, no run, slower ball outside off, goes for the drive and the ball barely bounces, rolls under the bat and all the way to the keeper
Aamer Yamin to Bopara, 1 run, slower short ball outside off, pulled to deep midwicket
Aamer Yamin to Vince, FOUR, very full outside off and Vince makes himself room, jams his bat down on the ball, and squeezes it away to the point boundary. This guy knows how to hit the gaps
Shahid Afridi to Bopara, SIX, tossed up outside off and that is powerful from Bopara. Gets down low and slog-sweeps it, flat and hard over the midwicket boundary
Shahid Afridi to Bopara, 1 run, back of a length wide of off, chopped away through backward point
Shahid Afridi to Vince, 2 runs, slow flight outside off and this time Vince opens out and sweeps along the ground, to the left of the deep square leg fielder
Shahid Afridi to Vince, FOUR, shortish, wide of off, and those nimble hands come into play again as he slaps it away to the cover point boundary
Shahid Afridi to Vince, 1 run, looks to sweep and misses. This one was the slider, no turn, hits his front pad, but it's a long way forward and across the crease, hits him outside the line
Shahid Afridi to Bopara, 1 run, tossed up slow outside off and he's too early into his cover drive, bottom hand comes into play as he drags it down to long-on
Wahab Riaz to Bopara, 1 run, fullish outside off, lets it come on and steers it down to third man

Wahab Riaz to Vince, FOUR, back of a length on off stump and that's a super shot from Vince, makes a bit of room and flat-bats down the ground, to the right of long-off. Was travelling very quickly, and Hafeez dived full-length, got his hands to it, but couldn't prevent the boundary
Wahab Riaz to Vince, 1 run, gives himself room to go over cover, ends up inside-edging towards fine leg
Wahab Riaz to Bopara, 2 runs, slower ball outside off, dabbed away to the left of third man
Wahab Riaz to Bopara, 1 run, in the blockhole on middle stump, makes a bit of room and stabs it out towards deep point
Wahab Riaz to Vince, no run, once again, a wide full-toss. Left alone, not called wide this time
Tait to Bopara, FOUR, full, angling down leg, and he just gets a little tickle on it as he looks to flick, and Kamran, diving to his left to catch it, only gets the tip of his glove on it
Tait to Bopara, 1 run, short, angling into the body, pulled to deep square leg
Tait to Vince, OUT, bowled him! There's the quick, pinpoint middle-stump yorker, and Vince plays across it and all around it
Tait to Sohail Tanvir, no run, short ball outside off, pulled to deep midwicket
Tait to Sohail Tanvir, 1 leg bye, appeal for lbw as he misses the flick, but that pitched a fair way outside leg stump
Tait to Bopara, 1 run, low full-toss on the pads, flicked away to long leg
Aamer Yamin to Bopara, FOUR, full-toss on middle and leg and that's a lovely pick-up shot, just clips it into the gap between deep midwicket and long-on
Aamer Yamin to Bopara, 1 run, short outside off, pulled to deep midwicket
Aamer Yamin to Sohail Tanvir, no run, fullish slower ball angling away outside off, left alone

Aamer Yamin to Sohail Tanvir, SIX, full-toss on the hips and he's just whipped that away, up and over the square leg boundary. Seems surprised it wasn't called no-ball, but that wasn't above waist height
Aamer Yamin to Sohail Tanvir, no run, slower ball outside off, takes a mighty heave at it, across the line, and misses
Aamer Yamin to Sohail Tanvir, FOUR, short ball, sits up outside off, and that's a crisp blow from Tanvir, pulls it firm and flat to the wide long-on boundary
Wahab Riaz to Bopara, no run, fullish, swinging down leg. Clips the edge of the pad through to the keeper diving to his left as he misses the flick
Wahab Riaz to Bopara, SIX, full on middle and off and that's a huge hit. Bopara gets his front leg out of the way and swings freely through the line to launch it over long-off
Wahab Riaz to Bopara, 1 run, in the blockhole outside off, stabbed down the ground to long-off
Wahab Riaz to Sohail Tanvir, no run, fullish outside off, Tanvir slogs across the line and misses
Wahab Riaz to Sohail Tanvir, no run, slower ball outside off, and there's another swing-and-miss from Tanvir
Wahab Riaz to Bopara, no run, slower short ball, angling across towards off stump. Bopara is too early into the pull and it hits him on the side
Tait to Sohail Tanvir, FOUR, short ball angling away from Tanvir, who goes for the pull and top-edges it over the keeper
Tait to Sohail Tanvir, 1 leg bye, slower ball on the pads, looks to flick and misses, hits his pad and rolls to short fine leg
Tait to Bopara, SIX, full outside off, the length and the width are just perfect for Bopara to launch high over extra cover

Tait to Bopara, 2 runs, yorker on off stump. Looks to make room to drive into the off side and it sneaks away through midwicket off the inside edge. Takes two as deep midwicket runs in, and reaches his half-century
Tait to Bopara, FOUR, full, a bit too much width, and Bopara opens his bat face adroitly, uses the pace to lift it over backward point
Tait to Bopara, FOUR, fullish on the stumps. Bopara backs away, looking to club through the leg side, and gets another inside edge that races away to the fine leg boundary

Wahab Riaz to Sohail Tanvir, 2 runs, miscued, but he's safe. That's another full-toss from Wahab, not a high one, though, and he slogs at it and skews it away towards deep midwicket but it doesn't carry to the fielder
Wahab Riaz to Sohail Tanvir, no run, slower ball outside off and Tanvir slogs and misses
Wahab Riaz to Sohail Tanvir, no run, in the blockhole outside off, can't get any power on the drive, jabs it back to the bowler
Wahab Riaz to Sohail Tanvir, no run, wide yorker, beautifully bowled. Tanvir reaches out to stab it away but the ball sneaks under his bat

Wahab Riaz to Sohail Tanvir, SIX, slower short ball on off stump, and this time Tanvir doesn't heave blindly. Watches it, keeps a stable base, and pulls it away over the square leg boundary. Super shot!

Wahab Riaz to Sohail Tanvir, OUT, yorker, bowled between his legs. What a delivery. Tanvir played across it and lost his leg stump. But the margins are so tiny in this format. That hit the stump and raced to the fine leg boundary. An inch off target and this could have been four byes.
Sammy to Bopara, SIX, full and wide, and that is hardly the ball to be bowling to Bopara in this mood. He gets on the front foot and just launches it over the cover point boundary
Sammy to Bopara, 2 runs, down the track to the wide one outside off, drives to the right of sweeper cover

Sammy to Bopara, OUT, full-toss outside off, and Bopara has holed out! He could have hit that to a lot of places on this ground, but he's swiped at it, failed to middle it, and picked out the fielder at long-on
Sammy to Usama Mir, 1 run, full, close to off stump, goes for the big drive but hits it all along the ground, too close to long-off to think of a second run

Sammy to Saifullah Bangash, OUT, fullish outside off, not quite up there for the big cover drive, and the ball beats his outside edge. They look to sneak a bye and Kamran keeps his cool, underarms and hits the stumps direct to have Mir comfortably run out
Sammy to Mohammad Amir, no run, looks for the wide yorker, wasn't quite a yorker, but Amir goes for the big cover drive and can't put bat to ball. What a win for Zalmi!
